DOC.brief_summary: This study comparison traditional prescription versus lifestyle exercise prescription sedentary adult 6 month . Biological psychological parameter assess 6 month study . Biological indicator assess pre post include body composition , muscular strength , endurance , flexibility , aerobic fitness , blood test . Psychological parameter assess pre , mid , post include self-efficacy , motivation , need satisfaction , physical self-description , leisure-time exercise , well construct thepry plan behaviour .
DOC.brief_title: Health Psychological Outcomes Lifestyle Versus Traditional Physical Activity
DOC.criteria: 2565 year old exercise le twice per month preceeding 6 month physician consent participate health problem exercise twice per month preceeding 6 month
